experiences.description: At Yonder, I delivered secure and high-performance systems to support the UKâ€™s smart metering infrastructure. My work involved developing new features, ensuring security through data encryption, and integrating AWS services like Lambda and CloudHSM.

In this role, I provided backend support for a major fintech in the Middle East, optimizing SQL reporting and implementing automated processes to replace manual tasks, enhancing efficiency and accuracy.

I contributed to backend development on a greenfield project, enhancing feature optimization and quality assurance through regular code reviews, testing, and SQL query customization to meet specific business needs.

I developed and maintained components for an internal tool for a top European car manufacturer, focusing on feature development, code quality improvements, and testing for fuel economy and aerodynamics data generation.

Working with one of the Netherlands' largest banks, I developed and maintained data components for client reports, designed core algorithms, and optimized reporting capabilities with tests to ensure high reliability.
